May 2, 1954 D Blackpool Contest
Blackpool Contest 0 Test Piece Contest Blackpool Contest blackpool-contest
Recollections of Mendelssohn
Tower Circus, Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Best soloist Jack Ralph (cornet) Eccles Borough. Best soprano - Freckleton, Best trombone - Eccles, Best euphonium - Pemberton, Best flugal - Burnley Alliance. March contest 1st Freckleton (90), 2nd Hoggarths (88) 3rd Eccles (86), 4th Preston Town(84)
9 bands competed.
